p.span: For each event, lookup the value of a field and return the membership values of each concept. A column will be added to the event stream for each concept in the context.
xsFindMembership field [FROM context] [IN container] [BY class] [SCOPED scope]
xsFindMembership AirTime IN MyAirTime BY Tuesday SCOPED private
Looks up the field 'AirTime' and adds the membership value for each concept, in the context 'AirTime' in container 'MyAirTime' with class 'Tuesday' in scope 'private', as a field in each event.
The field in each event to look up in the container/context/class/scope.
If specified, use this as the context instead of 'field'
The scope (private, app, global) where the container is stored.
Each event has the membership value of 'field' added for each concept in the specified Context.
